import React,{useState,useEffect,useRef}from"react";import"./ChatBox.css";// Keep styles in ChatBox.css
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ChatBox=()=>{const[messages,setMessages]=useState([]);const[input,setInput]=useState("");const chatHistoryRef=useRef(null);// Ref for scrolling
useEffect(()=>{// Unregister service workers
if(navigator.serviceWorker&&navigator.serviceWorker.controller){navigator.serviceWorker.controller.postMessage({command:"unregister"});}// Scroll to bottom on new messages
if(chatHistoryRef.current){chatHistoryRef.current.scrollTop=chatHistoryRef.current.scrollHeight;}},[messages]);const sendMessage=()=>{if(!input.trim())return;try{const vscode=window.acquireVsCodeApi();vscode.postMessage({command:"generateCode",prompt:input});setMessages([...messages,{text:input,sender:"user"}]);setInput("");}catch(e){console.error("Failed to send message:",e);}};window.addEventListener("message",event=>{if(event.data.command==="showCode"){setMessages([...messages,{text:event.data.code,sender:"bot"}]);}});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"chat-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"chat-history",ref:chatHistoryRef,children:messages.map((msg,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`message ${msg.sender}`,children:msg.text},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"chat-input-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"chat-input",placeholder:"Type your task here (@ to add files...)",value:input,onChange:e=>setInput(e.target.value),onKeyDown:e=>{if(e.key==="Enter"){sendMessage();}}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input-buttons",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"input-button",children:"+"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"input-button",children:"\uD83D\uDCF7"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"send-button",onClick:sendMessage,children:"\u27A4"})]})]})]});};export default ChatBox;
